title: Documentation: broken link to plan9.bell-labs.com
body:
plan9.bell-labs.com seems to have been deactivated. There is now many broken links in packages documentation: https://github.com/golang/go/search?utf8=âœ“&q=plan9.bell-labs.com

For example, `path` package link to: http://plan9.bell-labs.com/sys/doc/lexnames.html. I found a mirror that can be helpful: https://9p.io/sys/doc/lexnames.html.
